segments.text: My eyes are drawn to the activity happening near the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A young boy is attempting to reach the cookie jar on a high shelf.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's standing on a small, two-step stool, which looks incredibly shaky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The legs are splayed outwards; it looks like it could tip at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His smaller sister stands nearby, looking up with eager anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She has her hand out, clearly expecting a share of the spoils.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got one hand in the cookie jar and a plate in the other.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is quite an elaborate, secret operation they've got going on.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I really hope that stool doesn't collapse under his weight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A fall from that height onto a hard kitchen floor would be terrible.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman nearby is completely unaware of their daring plan.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's so engrossed with her plate, she wouldn't notice a thing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a wonder how children manage these risky endeavors unnoticed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're working together, a tiny team of cookie conspirators.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: My heart is racing a bit just watching his precarious balance.
segments.speaker: PAR
